department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A
full_summary:
# SCNWA Tractor Procurement Notice

## Closes: 2022-09-26T14:00:00

### Tenders Requested
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bids for:

* SCNWA Tractor
* Region of Ontario (excluding NCR)
* Delivery to Environment and Climate Change Canada

### Key Business Information
* Tender Number: K2D59-230295/A
* Solicitation URL: None

### Bidder Requirements

* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement under Request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A
* If not already a pre-qualified supplier, contact Public Works and Government Services Canada for information on how to become pre-qualified

### Goods and Services Required
The Government of Canada requires one (1) SCNWA Tractor. The delivery date for these goods is March 31, 2023.

### Awarding Authority Contact Information

* Contact: Judy Holt
* Email: judy.holt@pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 536-4995

### Notice Posting Details
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

### Bid Evaluation and Award

* The bid shall be awarded to the lowest-priced bid that meets the requirements of the tender
* Evaluation and award panels will use the lowest price as the primary method of evaluation

### Bidders who wish to submit a bid are advised to register with the Government of Canada before submitting their bid
